lines.text:
[after Phil takes the microfilm out of the scientist's raincoat]
But good gracious, do you mean to say that's been in my pocket all that time? Why give it to me yesterday and take it back today?
Cause I felt sorry for you. You seemed to be in a tight spot.
Why don't you let me have it today?
Because I'm in a tight spot now. I think the police suspect that I killed Tony Roscoe.
But what use are the microfilms to you?
Gonna use them as bait. Maybe I can catch the fellow that's behind all this.
